website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Equalizer 2.0 has become a go-to shoe for casual and recreational purposes for a considerable number of buyers. It was able to provide a comfortable, lightweight, and well-cushioned walking experience. Moreover, it helped relieve foot and joint pain for some wearers. Even though the shoe wore out a bit faster than some people expected, its positive assets still overshadowed the criticisms.
pros: A vast majority of buyers marveled at the comfort provided by the Skechers Equalizer 2.0
Based on general user feedback, the shoe was highly recommended for walking, traveling, and even going out
Nearly all owners reported that the trainer was true to size and width
A lot of wearers lauded how light the shoe felt on the foot
The sole cushioning was also appreciated by many users
People with wide foot dimensions were happy to find a well-fitting and attractive shoe in an extra-wide option
The trainer accommodated wearers with bone spurs and rheumatism, soothing their foot pain
Several reviewers also noted that its slip-on design allowed for an easy on-and-off
cons: A scant number of users wrote that the outsole wore out and lost traction too soon
Multiple buyers with high insteps had to return the shoe due to it tight fit across the upper

customer_reviews.title: Slightly imperfect but very comfy
customer_reviews.text: For a premium price £44 I expected the material to not become stretched and floppy, mine arrived with lines in them, have ordered another pair in case it was a one-off, but very, very comfy indeed and fit is perfect. Will adjust stars accordingly once fully reviewed. Update after 10 days of light use: Very disappointed, look more like they have been around the world and look battered (see pics), this merely after 10 days of use, look horrible now although still comfy as ever, such a shame, even the print inside is worn out, in 10 days!!! I am wondering if this is why many other stores dont stock them, such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: IE

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. Wont go back to any other shore. Very comfy and light. Wider for than expected. My feet and ankles are swollen die to rheumatoid arthritis. After reading reviews and asking other buyers about suitable fitting for swollen feet I was advised these would be ok. I can confirm that these are better than okay and are brilliant for arthritis sufferers and people woth wider than normal feet. They have space for further expansion of need be. I will always buy skechers woth theor memory foam as these are cross between shoes/trainers and slippers.
customer_reviews.author: talo

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam technology makes it feel like your stepping on new trainers every time
customer_reviews.text: I always wonder what all the fuss was about but having bought these I have been converted. From here on in its Sketchers every time. The memory foam technology makes it feel like your stepping on new trainers every time. The very first time I stood straight in them I could feel the support in my calf muscles. Can’t say enough AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael soteriou

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable Sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: I received my new skeckers today, I am disabled and have difficulty walking so got these, and they are very comfortable I feel like walking on air.. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but big
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, super comfy actually, but a little too large and floppy so I'm using them as house slippers instead.

customer_reviews.title: Every Size is a different Price!
customer_reviews.text: What A Farce! Every size is a different price! My size 7 size was £7 more expensive than the identical shoe in size 8! How can this ridiculous practise be permitted? Not only that, but a size 7 which is my shoe size was too tight with a sketchers UK size 7! Absolutely Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: russell casselson

customer_reviews.title: Funny size Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Have a pair of Sneaker trainers size 10 bought from Amazon perfect fit. The pair of Equalizer 2.0 low top sneakers are much larger approx 1'' longer in length much to big. No star rating very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mary A Gaze
